name: Screamy Hoops
description:
This game was made for the BTP 3 Game Jam with the theme: Less is More.

It's basically Flappy Bird but uses scream power instead of taps.

I incorporated the theme by lowering the microphone input volume when you get a score under 10. 

Music made by: NextInLine.

WARNING: DO NOT PLAY THIS GAME TOO MUCH BECAUSE YOU MIGHT LOSE YOUR VOICE.
